sense.def:
To wipe something
pomeni podrgniti površino nečesa, da bi z nje odstranili umazanijo ali tekočino.

seg.quote: He wiped his mouth with the back of his hand.

sense.def:
To wipe dirt or liquid from something
pomeni odstraniti umazanijo ali tekočino z nečesa, na primer s krpo ali roko.

seg.quote: She wiped the tears from her eyes.

sense.def:
To wipe out a place or group of people
pomeni popolnoma uničiti kraj ali skupino oseb.

seg.quote: Epidemics wiped out the local population.
